name: Destoria: The Withering
description:
A game of skill and determination!

Destoria: The Withering is a top shooter in which the goal is to survive as many waves of spiders as possible. With different varieties of arachnids coming at you from multiple directions, you must use your ammo and health wisely in order to stay alive. Pick up health drops and acquire the flamethrower to reach maximum player experience and hope the your trigger finger is fast enough!

Although it is a single player game, compete for a spot in our leaderboard!

Destoria: The withering is available on iOS App Store, Google Play Store, and on Steam for Pc and Mac.
